name: The Terrors of Trantoss
overview: Following a familiar theme, an evil power rises when an undead wizard once banished to the mountains of Mortran returns to terrorise the villagers of a small village in the fantasy land of Hapshal. The followers of the undead wizard Trantoss have been gathering the shattered pieces of the golden mace that once gave him his powers and the player takes control of two brothers, the strong woodcutter Lobo and the stealthy rogue Scarn who's mission is to thwart their evil plot. This conventional text adventure comes with a twist as the screen is split ion three segments, on the far left a picture vertically depicts the scenario, the center depicts the two main characters highlighting the active one and the right side displays the traditional text interface.
